div.p: This Maven plugin generates the Netbeans Module (NBM) files.
Currently the plugin will ensure your jars are netbeans enabled, will create nbm files for easy updating, not only for your code but possibly also for it's dependencies.

In order to run the plugin, you will need to get the nbantext.jar file from netbeans.org. Currently it's not downloadable, you will need to build it from the sources, and checkout the nbbuild module from Netbeans' cvs. Then go to nbbuild directory and run ant. Once the nbantext.jar file is created you can about the build.
